title: Strange Bug
body: As of the past few days, whenever I'm in game half of my commands don't work. If I click the mini map and begin walking to my destination, but click somewhere else in the meantime, the second command doesn't register. Is there a way to fix this?

replies.body:
Try repairing the game files by clicking the help button (question mark) before you log in and click repair (takes a long time).

If that doesn't work you may have to re-download the game.
